Research Notes

Markdown supports footnotes1 for references and citations.

The syntax was popularized by PHP Markdown Extra2.

Definition Lists

Term One
The first definition.
An alternate definition.
Term Two
The second definition with inline code.

Combined

According to the specification3, definition lists and footnotes can coexist in a single document.

  2. See the PHP Markdown Extra documentation. ↩︎
